OOC: Wow! So many posts! I'll have to keep up faster!

BIC:

Ultra Magnum: =
You see, my friend? The Iron Skulls have been penalized
for destroying your=
 home unit, but have they been punished?

Civilian: Well... No. They've bee=
n expelled from the city and can't
come back without a valid permit... Damn=
 them! Just because that
scrapheap Jotunn gave himself up, we went soft on =
the whole lot!

Ultra Magnum: And what would you have? Would you leave them=
 be, just
as Razorwing does?

Civilian: I would.... I would find the bastar=
d who fired at us and
bash the circuits out of him... That's how I would st=
art!

Ultra Magnum: and that's how we'll all start! We will act, sooner tha=
n
later, but first, we have to keep it secret. Some people are content
with=
 the way things are. Best let them sleep.

Civilian: Right! I'll come back =
later.

Ultra Magnum: I know you will!

He smiled and watched the small bot=
 go. Things were going great;
people were too unhappy to stay quiet.

--- I=
